name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn Automation: Email Finder, Cold Outreach Messages with ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn Email Finder & phones, bulk send connections, personalized messages, comments, liking profiles to boost B2B lead generation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 LinkedIn Automation Tool powered by ChatGPT: Email & Phone Finder, Cold Outreach, Bulk Personalized Connections & Messages, Auto Reactions & Comments on Posts, Import/Export Profiles to CSV/CRM, Sales Navigator Support.

Last Updates:
8 January 2025 - Add user friendly onboarding and sign process on Linkedin Profile pages
4 January 2025 – Improve UI design
23 December 2024 – Added auto-commenting on LinkedIn's latest posts.
10 December 2024 – Imported LinkedIn profiles from CSV and text files.
27 November 2024 – Added auto-reacting (liking, etc.) to LinkedIn's latest posts.

Summary:

Use collected LinkedIn profiles from Search Tab or Imported from Text/CSV:
✉️ Safety send 100+ personalized connection requests with personalized outreach messages to new LinkedIn profiles from Search by any filter (for example: Job Title)
🚀 KILLER FEATURE: Post a personalized comment, either static or generated with ChatGPT, on the latest posts of a LinkedIn profile ON THE FLY (Automatically). Just click Launch and start attracting your leads.
🧡 Bulk reacting on the latest posts of LinkedIn profiles ON THE FLY (Automatically).
📂 Import from CSV your LinkedIn profiles from your CRM or scrapped/parsed list to apply actions in bulk like connect, send personalized message, find emails, find phones, react to their last posts.
✉️ Safely send 100+ personalized messages to LinkedIn profiles you've already connected with. (follow up, happy birthday, remind about your product)
💬 Comment automatically on their recent posts (in bulk).
📨 Send bulk InMail messages.
👍 React to their latest posts (like, empathy, interest, etc.).
📧 Find Emails & Phone Numbers on LinkedIn Profile page (Access contact details directly on LinkedIn profiles. We use on server databases from Apollo, FullContact, Hunter.io, Prospeo, and Clay.
📂 Export LinkedIn parsed, scrapped and enriched profiles into CSV for your CRM.
💻 Sales Navigator Integration for more advanced searches.
🏷️ Use dynamic placeholders like First Name, Last Name, Company, and Title to personalize every interaction.
💻 Seamless integration with LinkedIn—no need to use any other sites or services. All buttons will be visible directly on the site.
🔍 Buttons for "Find Email" and "Find Phone" appear on profile pages, even in Sales Navigator.
💼 Collect LinkedIn Profiles - Gather profiles directly from the Search Tab by Job Title, Location (City, Country), Company, School, Previous Job, Language, Service, and Industry.


Perfect for Sales, Marketing, and Recruiting teams aiming to expand their network and boost results.

Online Support:
📢 Take your LinkedIn game to new heights. Get in touch with us at 📧 yaroslav91@gmail.com 
or visit my website at 🌐 https://docgpt.ai/cold-outreach-messages-linkedin-2024/
